name: Suspicious Userinit Child Process
description: Detects a suspicious child process of userinit
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:*\\userinit.exe AND (NOT (process.command_line:*\\netlogon\\*))) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\explorer.exe OR ImageFileName:explorer.exe)))`
